title: while power on my system,i face these problem [solved]

forumNotes.author: prabhakaran
forumNotes.content:
when i switch on my system (my cpu fan runs --hard disk light goes on after some time   
it goes down then aslo no power light is turning on)   

after i press several times the reset button ( it starts ) whats the problem??   
when i press my reset it starts...  

i tried by changing the button links..  
i tried by connecting (without by using the buttons)  

but i face the same symptoms!  

![:good:](http://reboot.pro/public/style_emoticons/default/good.gif)**Solution:
1- cleaned my RAM...so i got solved!!![^_^](http://reboot.pro/public/style_emoticons/default/happy.png)**

forumNotes.author: Brito
forumNotes.content:
hmm.. sounds like a defective motherboard. Any chance of returning it back at store to replace with a new one? From what you write it may be several things. Does the motherboard beep when starting up? If so, are the beeps different from the expected when running normally? ----------------- If it doesn't even beep then it isn't probably running the POST (Power On Self Test) diagnostic, meaning that it's directly related to the motherboard hardware.
Some things to be aware: - Bad power supply - Wrong jumper configuration - Invalid BIOS configuration - Bad RAM modules - CPU is dead/defective Would recommend reading the motherboard's documentation to see what it says about the configuration and try to set it back to factory default. If everything else fails and seems beyond logic to solve then it's likely a hardware issue and nothing more can be done other than replacing with a new board. ![:good:](http://reboot.pro/public/style_emoticons/default/good.gif)

forumNotes.author: prabhakaran
forumNotes.content: thanks !! i will do the necessary!
